content: Ok, enough of my ranting for one night. I can only rant for so long before I just feel blech. Anyway, list someting good that's happened to you this week. I'll list one. Our taxes came in today and we got a Lot. Trust me when I say A LOT. More than we've ever gotten. Guess it pays to have all those chilren "It is the weak who are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong" -- Leo Roskin

content: Congratulations! She is a doll.
reply: Congratulations! She is a doll.
title: Good news thread!

content: WOW! You are on a roll creating threads I want to comment in! Woo hoo! Hell yes there is good news. As of yesterday, I am now the proud owner of a ticket, airlines, round trip, lady issued, 1 each. Boring to some, but I am giddy like a school girl. 2.5 days and 3 nights of doing absolutely nothing but being with the lady I adore so deeply that she invades my thoughts at the most inopportune times. No concerns or fears, no money worries, no stressing over work. Just enjoy the weekend. I don't plan on getting dressed past my Gi, screwing around with bids or email, or cooking a damn thing. No laundry, cleaning, organizing, or tasks. I'm going to lay there next to her and sleep (heh, riiiiiiight) the entire weekend away with nothing but a little music to break the monotony of silent background noise. Just talking and snuggling. Yes, I said snuggling. Bite me. But, in case I haven't been obvious enough yet, I am ecstatic more than anything else. I just cannot WAIT to see her, and these three weeks are going to creep by with an agonizing pace that makes prison look like a Caribbean vacation. 38 years old and smitten by the charms of a lady. Ain't life grand? It's not that there is no God or that He isn't listening. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.

content: Minor in the general scheme of things but I was sure one happy camper yesterday to win the bidding on ebay. I got this backrest/rack for my bike. I didn't want to buy new as my bike is a restored 1980 Yamaha. Then along came this seller with one from the early 80's that has been kept in storage, looking brand new, so I had to have it. Happy, happy, happy! More for my son and my girlfriend obviously but something I really wanted. Don
